tweets.author: オリコンニュース
tweets.text:
SUPER EIGHT Yū Yokoyama Suffers Injury Requiring 2 Months to Heal
Fractured Right Rib, Lumbar Spine Sprain in "Prank GP"
https://oricon.co.jp/news/2424632/full/?utm_source=Twitter&utm_medium=social&ref_cd=jstw003…

On the afternoon of 12/11 (Thu), during filming for Fuji TV's "Prank GP" show, it happened while recording a game where he was on a

thread_replies.author: キャン.
thread_replies.text: Pranks that injure talents should really be stopped already  I just can't understand what's funny about them (like wake-up pranks are fine)

thread_replies.author: しら
thread_replies.text: Fuji TV, at this point, it's just kinda amazing, isn't it? I almost want the network's very existence to be some kind of prank.

thread_replies.author: Bobとニャンコ
thread_replies.text: I'm worried that a lumbar sprain might turn into a hernia later on.

thread_replies.author: ゆっきぃ。
thread_replies.text: I really want you to be careful with work stuff 　Safety first, please make it a fun show 　Yokoyama-kun, I pray you get better soon

thread_replies.author: ねふぇる
thread_replies.text: My husband has taken on all sorts of unpleasant jobs before because they're part of the work (like being sent into bat caves or forced to inhale cow burps), but he's not a young guy anymore... Fuji TV... unforgivable...

thread_replies.author: mochico
thread_replies.text:
I was just feeling all warm and fuzzy watching Yokoyama-kun from Onigiri House when this news totally blew my mind   
Time Machine 3-gō Yamamoto-san also broke a bone on this show! Oh man, why do these things keep happening?  
Can't watch Prank GP without worrying  
#横山裕

thread_replies.author: 村井 正彦
thread_replies.text:
フジテレビは1993年6月「ウッチャンナンチャンの やるならやらねば!」 の収録中、ゲストの香港のロックバンドBEYONDのウォン・カークイがセットから足を滑らせて転落して死亡した事故を起こしているのに忘れたのか？
この事故では内村さんも転落して、全治2週間の打撲傷を負ったんだけど...。

thread_replies.author: minimum
thread_replies.text:
Fuji TV, don't you have a lot of injured people?  
Stop pulling pranks on people in their 40s. It affects their real jobs, you know

thread_replies.author: yurino
thread_replies.text: Yoko is too kind, so even if he gets seriously injured, he seems like he'd apologize to the staff saying it's his own fault and he's sorry, which makes me anxious.

thread_replies.author: Perplexity
thread_replies.text: Greatness begins with a question.

tweets.author: こはりん
tweets.text: 横山裕さんが怪我したっての、マッサマンの罰ゲームが逆バンジーから回転スピンになったのは安全性なのか経費削減なのかよくわかんなかったけど、どうやらただの経費削減だったみたいだな

thread_replies.author: ゆり@J事務所
thread_replies.text:
Rib fracture on the right side, lumbar spine sprain. Full recovery in 2 months.

How serious is this?! Will it affect my daily life going forward?! Experts, please tell me

thread_replies.author: Johnny's information
thread_replies.text:
【Yokoyama Yū Seriously Injured, Full Recovery in 2 Months】

It has been announced that SUPER EIGHT member Yokoyama Yū-kun sustained an injury (right rib fracture, lumbar spine sprain) requiring 2 months for full recovery during the filming of "Prank GP."

thread_replies.author: あちゃん
thread_replies.text:
Oh man, oh man  
The Cowcon stream, honestly, I was like "It's cheaper than I thought!"  
But then I saw stuff like  
"It's not a free stream"  
"I'd rather have the TV broadcast"  
And I'm shocked  

If you worked and didn't get paid, you'd be mad, right?  
The talents and staff

thread_replies.author: amiiii→あみ@スト6フレ募
thread_replies.text:
松屋、イクラのみのやつ頼むと悲しくなるけど、サーモンとイクラのやつは、脂の乗ったサーモンでご飯がススムので、そんな悪くないです。

マッサマン食った方が幸せになれるけど。

Dinner is Massaman curry

It was delicious, let's go buy it again♪

thread_replies.text:
This is definitely Massaman, right??
As a given, Yokoyama-kun is worried

Because of the main project he's involved in
He ended up causing a major injury to a senior colleague

Koji's mental state must be pretty messed up too...
I hope the agency takes full care of him...

thread_replies.text: 行きたいお店に入れなかったのでタイ料理食べようと思ったら偶然コラボしてたwww 隣席のお子さんが康二を指差して「マッサマン」って言ってた！

tweets.author: Nac
tweets.text:
Dinner is Massaman curry  
I learned about it from a mutual follower, and found out it can be bought at Muji.  
Thank you!  
Rich coconut flavor with a mild spiciness. I like this one better than butter chicken curry  
It was delicious, let's go buy it again♪
